en.name: E-Commerce Platform
en.description: A modern, scalable e-commerce solution built with Next.js and Stripe integration, designed to handle high traffic while delivering a seamless shopping experience.
en.overview: We partnered with RetailCo to rethink their entire digital sales channel. Starting from user research and competitive analysis, we designed and built a platform from the ground up — prioritising performance, SEO, and conversion at every decision point.
en.result: The platform launched to immediate success. Conversion rates climbed 50% within the first quarter. Page load times dropped from 4s to under 0.8s. Mobile revenue increased by 75%. The client reported it as the highest-impact technology investment they had made in a decade.
en.challenge: We start with deep discovery — understanding the business goals, user needs, technical constraints, and existing pain points before writing a single line of code.
en.solution: Iterative, test-driven development using modern technologies. We build in sprints with continuous client feedback loops to ensure quality and alignment at every stage.

process.title: Research
process.description: Deep discovery phase covering business goals, user needs, and technical constraints before writing a single line of code.

process.title: Development
process.description: Iterative, test-driven development in sprints with continuous client feedback loops to ensure quality at every stage.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Rigorous QA, performance optimisation, and staged rollout with close post-launch monitoring for a stable production environment.

testimonial.quote: BPX Innovations transformed our online presence. The platform is lightning fast and our sales have skyrocketed.
testimonial.name: Sarah Johnson

en.name: Healthcare Management System
en.description: Comprehensive patient management system with appointment scheduling, telemedicine, and medical records — fully HIPAA compliant.
en.overview: MediCare Plus needed to modernise an outdated paper-based process while meeting strict regulatory requirements. We delivered a secure, intuitive platform that both clinicians and patients love.
en.result: Appointment no-shows dropped 60%. Patient check-in time reduced by 80%. The system achieved full HIPAA compliance and patient satisfaction scores improved by 45% in the first six months.

process.title: Research
process.description: Stakeholder interviews with clinicians, admin staff, and patients to map the full workflow and compliance requirements.

process.title: Development
process.description: HIPAA-compliant architecture built with end-to-end encryption, role-based access, and real-time telemedicine capabilities.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Phased rollout across departments with staff training, data migration, and 24/7 monitoring during the transition period.

en.name: AI Analytics Dashboard
en.description: Real-time analytics dashboard with AI-driven insights, predictive modelling, and automated reporting for enterprise data teams.
en.overview: DataCorp processes millions of events daily but lacked a unified view of their data. We built an intelligent analytics platform that surfaces actionable insights automatically, reducing the time analysts spend on manual reporting.
en.result: The platform now processes over 10 million data points per hour with 94% prediction accuracy. Report generation that previously took hours now completes in minutes. Decision-making speed improved by 30% company-wide.

process.title: Research
process.description: Audit of existing data pipelines, analyst workflows, and KPI frameworks to understand what insights matter most.

process.title: Development
process.description: ML model training, real-time pipeline architecture, and custom D3.js visualisations built iteratively with analyst feedback.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Containerised deployment on AWS with auto-scaling, model versioning, and real-time alerting for anomaly detection.

en.name: Mobile Banking App
en.description: Secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication, instant transfers, and real-time transaction notifications.
en.overview: FinBank needed a mobile-first banking experience that could compete with neo-banks while meeting the strict security and compliance standards of a traditional financial institution.
en.result: The app launched with a 4.8-star rating on both app stores. Biometric adoption reached 92% within the first month. Customer support tickets related to account access dropped by 65%.

process.title: Research
process.description: Security threat modelling, regulatory review, and UX research with existing customers to map friction points.

process.title: Development
process.description: Native biometric integration, encrypted data storage, and PCI-DSS compliant payment processing built in React Native.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Staged rollout to beta users, penetration testing, and coordinated App Store / Play Store submission with compliance sign-off.

en.name: Social Media Platform
en.description: Feature-rich social networking platform with real-time messaging, stories, live streaming, and AI-powered content moderation.
en.overview: SocialConnect had a vision for a community-first social platform that prioritised authentic connections over algorithm-driven engagement. We built the infrastructure to support millions of concurrent users while keeping the experience fast and personal.
en.result: The platform scaled to 500K users in the first three months. Real-time messaging latency is under 50ms globally. Content moderation AI reduced harmful content reports by 78%.

process.title: Research
process.description: Community mapping, competitive analysis, and capacity planning to design an architecture that scales gracefully.

process.title: Development
process.description: WebSocket infrastructure, CDN-optimised media pipeline, and GraphQL API built with horizontal scalability in mind.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Load-tested infrastructure deployment across multiple AWS regions with automated failover and real-time monitoring.

en.name: Restaurant Management System
en.description: All-in-one restaurant POS with inventory management, online ordering, table reservations, and kitchen display system.
en.overview: FoodHub operated six locations with disconnected legacy systems causing inventory errors and delayed orders. We unified their operations into a single, real-time platform.
en.result: Order errors dropped by 90%. Inventory waste reduced by 35%. Online orders now account for 40% of total revenue, up from 12% before the platform launched.

process.title: Research
process.description: On-site observation across all six locations to document workflows, bottlenecks, and staff pain points.

process.title: Development
process.description: Real-time inventory sync, kitchen display integration, and unified POS built with offline-first architecture.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Hardware installation, staff training across all locations, and a parallel-run period to ensure zero disruption to service.

en.name: Learning Management System
en.description: Interactive online learning platform with adaptive video streaming, AI-powered assessments, and gamified progress tracking.
en.overview: EduTech needed to migrate 50,000 learners from a legacy LMS to a modern, engaging platform — without disrupting active courses or losing historical progress data.
en.result: Course completion rates increased by 42%. Learner satisfaction scores rose from 3.2 to 4.7 out of 5. The platform handled the full migration with zero data loss and less than 2 hours of planned downtime.

process.title: Research
process.description: Learning outcome analysis, instructor interviews, and audit of existing course content to plan a smooth migration strategy.

process.title: Development
process.description: Adaptive video player, AI quiz generation, gamification engine, and full data migration pipeline built in parallel.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: Phased migration with cohort-by-cohort rollout, real-time monitoring, and immediate rollback capability throughout.

en.name: IoT Smart Home System
en.description: Unified smart home control platform supporting 50+ device types with voice control, automation rules, and energy monitoring.
en.overview: SmartHome Inc needed a single app to replace the five separate apps their customers were using to control different devices. We designed a unified platform that feels as intuitive as it is powerful.
en.result: Customer app ratings improved from 2.9 to 4.6 stars. Support calls dropped by 55%. Energy monitoring features helped users reduce consumption by an average of 22%.

process.title: Research
process.description: Device protocol analysis, customer journey mapping, and home visit observations to understand real-world usage patterns.

process.title: Development
process.description: MQTT broker architecture, device abstraction layer, and React Native app with offline-first capability and local processing.

process.title: Deploy
process.description: OTA firmware update system, beta programme with 200 homes, and App Store launch with phased regional rollout.
